title: Taliyah or 50 Win XP boost
body:
I really want taliyah, but if I get a 50 win XP boost I can get to level 30, which would be awesome.
Edit:
Ok guys,
Now vote taliyah and say who you think I should be, I'm level 20 and it's my main account, so please say someone appropiate. (With the exception of zed) And, aswell, If you think I should be Zed or Taliyah, I really want both of them and if they are within 3 votes of someone else, I will let them win.

replies.body: Why are you wanting to get to lvl 30 so fast?
I've beaten level 30s  (some bronze, some silver, some even platinum) in custom games, I know I'm ready for ranked, but it's gonna take a long time.
you will still have like 23 win boots after getting 30

holy crap. I mean no offence but you have to understand my skepticism when you say that you haven't reached level 30 and yet you are ready to beat platinums? I mean you can't have "natural skill" at league. Its learnt and its practiced.

Are you new to the game, or a smurf? If you are new, I'd rather get Taliyah (or spend it on something else) because it's better for you to level up slowly, learn the game better, get more ip, etc, for runes and all that stuffs. Getting quickly to level 30 doesn't mean too much imo.

Thanks for the advice!
If you can, reply with your reason.
the XP required to hit lvl 30 got halved so i would take {{champion:163}}. If you win majority of your games you will make it to level 30 easily.

Honestly, if you HAD to choose between the two, go for Taliyah{{champion:163}} . Since you can really just wait it out to get to level 30 while trying new champs, better to go for Taliyah, a 6300 IP champion and then just save the IP for those rune pages when you hit 30.
Not like the extra game experience will do you any harm either.

Ok then, But should I get taliyah or someone else? Becuase I do want a few: Zed, Aurelion Sol, Lux, Fiora, Lee Sin, Riven, Darius, Shaco, Heimerdinger, Fiddlesticks, Alistar and Hecarim, Who should I get? {{champion:163}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:120}}

Taliyah is simple and easy to use, only problem is that she isn't broken or as strong as 95% as other champs, she is also quite squishy and her damage, utility and defense relies on hitting a small 1.5 sec delay knockup
